name: 🌏 Adventure 4.12.0
body:
This release, at long last, adds API to help work with the 1.19(.x) chat and sound changes, including sending messages with the new chat type system.

Due to the strict lifecycle of message signing, implementing the full chat flow will be mostly left to platforms. The exposed signed message API is intended for use with out-of-band operations like signed commands.

Thank you for your patience!

## Additions ✨
 
* feature: 1.19 chat changes by @kezz in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/777
* Implement seed field on sound, and add a builder by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/770
* key: Make Key implement Keyed by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/779
* Promote decorationIfAbsent to StyleSetter and Public API by @KingOfSquares in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/785
* Add convenience methods for appending a newline/space to a component by @KingOfSquares in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/786
* feat(key): #773 Expose methods to check if a Key can be parsed by @kashike in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/774
* api: Style#unmerge by @kashike in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/793

## Fixes 🐛 

* api: Remove use of terminally deprecated SecurityManager api by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/781
* api: Fix improper stripping of colors when compacting by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/782
* bug(#788): disable html escaping and use uppercase hex colour codes by @kashike in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/789
* minimessage: Parsing corner cases with quotes by @rymiel in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/819
* fix(text-minimessage): Don't strip style of text components in gradients by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/835
* fix(text-minimessage): Preserve non-text components in color changing tags by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/834
* fix(text-minimessage): Be more lenient with input when stripping/escaping tags by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/833
* fix(text-minimessage): Properly handle escaped tag opens by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/832
* fix(api): Catch cases where empty components are not preserved by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/838
* bug(https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/issues/792): don't throw on invalid click/hover event action by @kashike in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/1c2463fce400e91ad92de9e7d7466b4b95dad4ae
* bug(api): fix an issue when linearly building a component by @kashike in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/7bb187593c92ad1ddb77e761736d7b64a1171bac

## Platform Changes 🔧

* Add PlatformAPI Annotation by @KingOfSquares in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/778
* feat(api): bossbar platform implementation by @kashike in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/836

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/compare/v4.11.0...v4.12.0

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.11.0
body:
4.11.0 is a small feature release bundling up a variety of tweaks from the past few months. It does not incorporate any of the new API  for 1.19 features -- that is slated for 4.12.0, scheduled for release shortly after Mojang releases Minecraft 1.19.

## Additions ✨ 
* Add orThrow and orDefault methods to Index by @Machine-Maker in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/741
* feat(api): Add possibility of using Component#join with a root style by @KingOfSquares in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/653
* Improve compaction of empty/blank TextComponents by @Moulberry in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/764
* StyleImpl DRY (#392) by @emilyy-dev in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/461
* text-minimessage: Add Placeholder to format Numbers and TemporalAccessors by @JOO200 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/709
* Implement MiniMessage preprocessor and cleanup parsing by @bluelhf in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/749
* feat(minimessage): selector tag by @NoahvdAa in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/737
* text-logger-slf4j: introduce wrapper for formatted logging by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/757

## Fixes 🐛 
* fix negative number parsing for positions by @Machine-Maker in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/733
* MiniMessage: Handle arguments for PreProcessTags correctly by @JOO200 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/735
* fix: Fixed TagResolvers equality by @4drian3d in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/751
* text-minimessage: Validate tag names in resolver builder by @zml2008 in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/771

## New Contributors
* @Machine-Maker made their first contribution in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/733
* @4drian3d made their first contribution in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/751
* @Moulberry made their first contribution in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/764
* @bluelhf made their first contribution in https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/749

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/compare/v4.10.0...v4.11.0

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.10.1
body:
This is a minor bugfix release of Adventure to resolve some issues with MiniMessage tag filtering.

As a small programming note for those of you who test our snapshots, we will be moving from the (moderately overloaded) `oss.sonatype.org` to the newer `s01.oss.sonatype.org` for our snapshot repository in the near future. An announcement will be posted on Discord when this migration is complete, and the documentation will be updated.

# Fixes 🐛

- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/723 - minimessage: Ignore invalid tags when parsing
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/727 - minimessage: Add stacktraces and more details to legacy errors

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.10.0
body:
Adventure 4.10.0 is a feature release of Adventure, providing (at long last!) a stable release of the MiniMessage serialization format, as well as a variety of quality-of-life improvements. To get started with *MiniMessage*, take a look at its documentation: https://docs.adventure.kyori.net/minimessage/, and try it out with the [Web UI](https://webui.adventure.kyori.net)! Thanks to everyone who contributed to making this release happen -- it's been a long time coming! ## Additions ✨ * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/622 - Merge minimessage * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/490 - api: add TextDecoration#withState and add missing null pointer check * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/449 - api: Rename Title.Times.of * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/444 - Add decorations(Map) to component/style builders * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/472 - Add TriState toBoolean helper methods * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/480 - extra-kotlin: Added more extensions and enabled explicit API * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/495 - Add Tristate method to TextDecoration.State * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/482 - Add standard join configurations * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/479 - extra-kotlin: Add some `JoinConfiguration` related methods * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/501 - Abstract out style methods to StyleWriter/Reader * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/645 - feat(key): expose a Comparator for Key * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/617 - api: Introduce Component.textOfChildren as a replacement for TextComponent.ofChildren * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/652 - chore: Rename some static constructer methods * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/650 - feat(api): Internal configuration * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/698 - New builder * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/700 - key: make Key extend Namespaced * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/488 - `Component::applyFallbackStyle` helper method * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/717 - text-minimessage: Limit characters allowed in tag names ## MiniMessage changes since 4.2.0-SNAPSHOT Because MiniMessage had a fairly extended development process, there have been several notable changes (some breaking) since earlier development phases that may affect any testers of the older API. This is just a summary -- see [the documentation](https://docs.adventure.kyori.net/minimessage/api.html) for a full overview of the latest API. * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/635 - text-minimessage: Properly handle colour override depth reductions * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/663 - chore: Remove parse method * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/657 - Introduce a method by which to create raw replacements * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/671 - text-minimessage: Use a Consumer rather than Appendable for debug output * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/672 - minimessage: Unify transformations and placeholders * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/658 - text-minimessage: add deserialization method returning parsed tree * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/681 - fix: Require all input to be non-null * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/682 - minimessage: Add a reset tag via a parser directive * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/687 - Add a new tag for line breaks (`
`) * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/701 - Allow parsing with custom Tag Resolvers * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/703 - Rework the MiniMessage serializer to consolidate behavior into resolvers * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/708 - text-minimessage: Expose the root node type to API * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/707 - text-minimessage: Allow tags to be closed in one tag * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/662 - Warn when input contains legacy formatting codes (#515) * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/674 - Implement TransitionTag ## Fixes :bug: * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/485 - Add more non-null value validations * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/451 - api: Add inVersion to all @ApiStatus.ScheduledForRemoval annotations * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/493 - Fix accidental float and double NaN parsing * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/497 - Fix premature SNBT parsing as number * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/498 - Fix unquoted string being parsed as double * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/500 - Fix return type on #decorate method in ScopedComponent * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/481 - fix #447 by allowing `deserializeOr` to return `null` * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/633 - api: Resolve duplication of children when performing text replacement * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/641 - api: Use initial style when replacement-rendering a hover event * https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/647 - util: Add a range check for HSVLike ## Minor changes - Bump JetBrains annotations to 23.0.0 - `serializer-configurate4`: Bump Configurate dependency to 4.1.2 - https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/474 - Clarify Audience#filterAudience(Predicate) docs - https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/642 - Add tests for `Title` and `Title.Times` - https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/660 - chore: 2022 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/compare/v4.9.1...v4.10.0

## Fixes :bug:

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.9.0
body:
Adventure 4.9.0 is a feature release of Adventure, providing new API, some nice performance improvements for the GSON serializer, and a few bug fixes.

## Additions ✨  
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/365 - api: `Audience#forEachAudience` and `Audience#filterAudience`
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/339 - api: Component iterator
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/344 - api: Advanced `Component` joining
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/373 - text-serializer-gson: Migrate remaining serializers to use `TypeAdapter`s
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/406 - api: Add `TitlePart`
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/426 - api: Add `Locale` pointer
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/404 - api: Add `Keybind` interface
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/308 - api: Add support for 'compacting` components


## Fixes :bug: 
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/430 - fix: Check for null supplier
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/421 - api: Merge style of full match when replaced
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/407 - api: Make sure pointers()is overridden in `ForwardingAudience.Single`

## Dependency updates

- Bump `examination` from 1.1.0 to 1.3.0
- Bump JetBrains annotations to 22.0.0
- `serializer-configurate3`: Bump Configurate dependency to 3.7.2
- `serializer-configurate4`: Bump Configurate dependency to 4.1.1

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.8.1
body:
## Fixes :bug: 
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/ad71410be383af40f3191d9b80f91d2ee52f14e7 - api: Don't fail when a decoration state is set
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/403 - Link between submodules in the published Javadoc

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.8.0
body:
## Additions ✨  
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/334 - api: Add support for new `separator` field in Minecraft 1.17
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/390 - Migrate from `checker-qual` to JetBrains annotations
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/328 - api: add `Sound.Source.Provider` interface
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/332 - api: Allow passing the replacement `MatchResult` to continuation predicates
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/327 - api: Expose ComponentLike -> Component conversion method
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/371 - key: Improve key method javadocs
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/352 - api: Add the ability to query an Audience for a value based on a Pointer key
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/393 - api: Add Pointer query to Single
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/361 - api: Add Translatable interface
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/343 - api: Allow platforms to apply implementation hooks when creating `ComponentSerializer`s
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/379 - api: Add ability to unset decorations during component construction
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/329 - api: Allow stopping a sound using the original `Sound`
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/316 - api: Add support for playing sound following an "emitter"
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/215 - api: Add `TextColor.lerp` to blend between two colours

## Fixes :bug: 
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/333 - text-serializer-legacy: Properly passthrough invalid RGB codes
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/355 - api: Fix typo in deserializeOrNull
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/364 - api: Add contains method that allows alternative methods of equality comparison
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/issues/389 - api: `NamedTextColor` examinable properties should include name

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.7.0
body:
## Deprecations :older_adult: 
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/301 - api: Mark ScoreComponent's `value` as deprecated since it is no longer supported as of 1.16
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/307 - api: Deprecate Component#detectCycle (#285)

## Additions ✨  
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/259 - api: Add `contains` method to translation registries
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/296 - serializer-gson: Add deserializer for JsonElement
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/305 - api: Add serializer methods that can process `null` values (#221)
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/298 - serializer-gson: Add serializer to JsonElement
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/300 - api: Nag when somebody does something naughty
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/306 - build: Add extra metadata to jar manifests (#290)
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/302 - api: Introduce new concept of a component flattener

## Fixes :bug: 
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/297 - bom: fix missed text-serializer-gson-legacy-impl
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/299 - text-serializer-legacy: Tweak reset behavior again
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/304 - Fixed typo in documentation in Title

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.6.0
body:
## Additions ✨  
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/273 - feature(nbt): allow merging compound tags via `this.put(that)` 
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/280 - api: Add `asHSV` to `RGBLike` and use HSV for color comparisons in `NamedTextColor.nearestTo`
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/283 - extra-kotlin
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/284 - Added ZLIB compression support for NBT
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/288 - api: Add `Keyed` overloads to hover event types
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/289 - api: Add a method to create a TextColor from an HSVLike
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/292 - api: Add methods to join components using a collector
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/294 - build: Update examination to 1.1.0
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/283 - extra-kotlin
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/231 - Customize debugger output

## Fixes :bug: 
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/291 -  text-serializer-legacy: Don't insert redundant resets

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.5.1
body:
## Fixes :bug: 
- [#266](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/issues/266) -  text-serializer-legacy: `StringIndexOutOfBoundsException` when parsing malformed hex colors
- [#277](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/issues/277) -  api: `TextColor.color(int)` / `NamedTextColor.ofExact(int)` don't ignore the alpha channel

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.5.0
body:
## Fixes :bug: 
- [#278](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/issues/278) -  nbt: return the empty list tag when trying to create a listtag with an empty list of tags

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.4.0
body:
## Additions ✨  
- [#228](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/228) - Add JetBrains `@Contract` annotation to some methods
- [#240](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/240) - nbt: Add the ability to add multiple tags to a `CompoundBinaryTag`
- [#241](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/241) - nbt: Add `BinaryTagLike` interface
- [https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/dccfc466e9f392fc1bcd08d0ed1c249414c33ae5](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/dccfc466e9f392fc1bcd08d0ed1c249414c33ae5) - nbt: Implement `toString` in binary tags
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/247 - nbt: Add `getList` methods to `ListBinaryTag`
- https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/248 - nbt: Add `from(Iterable)` and `add(Iterable)` methods to `ListBinaryTag`
- [#229](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/229) - api: Expand javadocs (thanks @KingOfSquares)

## Fixes :bug: 
- [#233](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/233) - api: Correct handling of children in some text replacements
- [#252](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/252) -  Do not exclude Component#empty from the children of TranslatableComponent
- [#257](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/257) - serializer-gson: Change output ordering to match the order of Vanilla components
- `nbt`: Resolve a security vulnerability that could lead to denial of service when loading specially crafted input

## Changes :wrench: 
- [https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/50482cfdf679d464f6e5a1c1f598277c1c10be8b](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/50482cfdf679d464f6e5a1c1f598277c1c10be8b) nbt: Deprecate usage of `listType` in `ListBinaryTag`, introduce `elementType` instead
- [https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/0a62bb15beede509008da1a49558d3f6f52f3395](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/0a62bb15beede509008da1a49558d3f6f52f3395) - api: Sound.Type extends Keyed

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.3.0
body:
## Additions ✨  
- [#217](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/217) - text-serializer-gson-legacy-impl
- [https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/60b2c932574dd0b9a7ddc259f427d5fb43efd6cf](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/commit/60b2c932574dd0b9a7ddc259f427d5fb43efd6cf) - api: add ComponentLike methods to BossBar 
- [#219](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/219) - api: Player list header/footer support

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.2.0
body:
## Additions ✨  
- [#183](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/183) - Introduce support for Configurate 4
- [#190](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/190) - nbt: Add array access and stream methods for tags
- [#200](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/200) - api: Add a builder for replacement config
- [#211](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/211) - Add a BOM for version alignment across submodules

## Fixes :bug: 
- [#193](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/193) - Ignore `null` values for `HoverEvent` NBT tag when deserialising using `text-serializer-gson` 
- [#196](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/issues/196) - Properly reset decorations when serialising to legacy format
- [#199](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/issues/199) - api: Fix handling of first replacements in child components
- [#213](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/issues/213) - `@NonNull` contract not being followed when using `GsonComponentSerializer`to deserilise "null"

## Changes :wrench: 
- Deprecate usage of `percent` in `BossBar`, introduce `progress` instead
- Deprecate old `replaceText` methods in favour of `replaceText` methods that use `TextReplacementConfig`

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.1.1
body:
## :bug: The fixes
- [#185 -  Fix `sendMessage` overloads on `ForwardingAudience`](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/185)

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.1.0
body:
## :cake: The additions
- `sendMessage` methods have been added to `Audience` that use the `Identity.nil()` identity by default - please make sure you are using the correct methods when sending messages

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.0.1
body:
## :bug: The fixes
- [#184 -  Fix translatable component rendering bug with nested children](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/pull/184)

name: 🌏 Adventure 4.0.0
body:
Adventure 4.0.0 is a leap forward for the library previously known as Text. Adventure is a cross-platform library that is designed to simplify using *Minecraft: Java Edition* user-interface elements across all the major platforms. It also adds support for the latest *Minecraft: Java Edition* version features to ensure you can develop the *best* adventures your plugin or server possibly can!

## The shiny new things :sparkle: 
- Documentation, available at [https://docs.adventure.kyori.net/](https://docs.adventure.kyori.net/)
- a new `Audience` framework
  - entry point for displaying/sending content (messages, boss bars, titles, sounds) to viewers, such as a player or the server console
  - a standard interface for platforms to implement, useful for cross-platform development
- ability to create and display a [`BossBar`](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/tree/master/api/src/main/java/net/kyori/adventure/bossbar)
- ability to create and display a [`Title`](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/tree/master/api/src/main/java/net/kyori/adventure/title)
- ability to play a [`Sound`](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/tree/master/api/src/main/java/net/kyori/adventure/sound)
- ability to use the [`Translator`](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/tree/master/api/src/main/java/net/kyori/adventure/translation) framework for using custom "server-side translations" in any `Component`-based content

## The refactors :wrench: 
- The package has moved from `net.kyori.text` to `net.kyori.adventure.text`
- `of` and `builder` methods in `Component` interfaces have moved to the `Component` interface - for example:
  - `TextComponent.of("foo")` becomes `Component.text("foo")`
  - `TextComponent.builder().content("foo")` becomes `Component.text().content("foo")`
- RGB colour support via `TextColor`
  - The standard colours, previously in [`TextColor`](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/blob/master/api/src/main/java/net/kyori/adventure/text/format/TextColor.java), can be found in [`NamedTextColor`](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/blob/master/api/src/main/java/net/kyori/adventure/text/format/NamedTextColor.java)
- changes to [`HoverEvent`](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/blob/master/api/src/main/java/net/kyori/adventure/text/event/HoverEvent.java) required to support Minecraft 1.16

## Platform support :tokyo_tower: 
- Bukkit (and forks, such as [Paper](https://papermc.io) and Spigot) has a [platform adapter](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure-platform) available
- BungeeCord has a [platform adapter](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure-platform) available
- Fabric has a [platform adapter](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure-platform) available
- [SpongeAPI](https://www.spongepowered.org/) 7.x has a [platform adapter](https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure-platform) available
- [SpongeAPI](https://www.spongepowered.org/) 8.x has **native** Adventure support - *no platform adapter is required*
- [Velocity](https://www.velocitypowered.com/) 1.1.x has **native** Adventure support - *no platform adapter is required*
